TableSettings.uniqueName:
IdeConnections%23vhgstbclone_mimirWITH stmt_xbrl_dates AS (SELECT to_date(capital_date, 'DD.MM.YYYY') AS capital_date, to_date(htv_date, 'DD.MM.YYYY') AS htv_date FROM xbrl_dates ), stmt_total_reg_cap AS ( SELECT total_regulatory_capital FROM capital_info ci WHERE ci.the_date = (SELECT capital_date FROM stmt_xbrl_dates) AND ci.consolidate_parent = 'Móðurfélag' ), stmt_main AS (SELECT CASE WHEN (GROUPING(vd.group_ssn) = 1) THEN 'ALL' ELSE COALESCE(vd.group_ssn, 'UNKNOWN') END AS group_ssn, CASE WHEN (GROUPING(vd.ssn) = 1) THEN 'ALL' ELSE COALESCE(vd.ssn, 'UNKNOWN') END AS ssn, SUM(NVL(vd.credit_risk_exposure,0))/(SELECT total_regulatory_capital FROM stmt_total_reg_cap) AS cr_limit, CASE WHEN grouping_id(vd.group_ssn, vd.ssn) = 0 THEN '' WHEN grouping_id(vd.group_ssn, vd.ssn) = 1 THEN 'Sum by group_ssn' WHEN grouping_id(vd.group_ssn, vd.ssn) = 3 THEN 'Sum by group_ssn, ssn' END AS what FROM V_CRD_LARGE_EXPOSURE_DETAIL vd WHERE vd.the_date= DATE'2017-03-31'
AND vd.group_ssn IN ('5612993909', '6301692919') GROUP BY rollup (vd.group_ssn, vd.ssn) ORDER BY vd.group_ssn, vd.ssn ) SELECT group_ssn, ssn, cr_limit, what FROM stmt_main
